蝭蝭蝭

蝭字的基本解释

蝭
dì
〔蝭蟧（
li俹 ）〕蝉。

蝭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tí］
［《廣韻》杜奚切，平齊，定。］
［《廣韻》都計切，去霽，端。］
(1)见“蝭蟧”、“蝭”。
(2)见“蝭蛙”。
[②]［chí］
［《集韻》常支切，平支，禪。］
(1)见“蝭2跂”。
(2)见“蝭2母”。

蝭字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝭； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1090第25
【唐韻】杜奚切【集韻】田黎切，?音題。蝭蟧，蟪蛄也。【大戴禮】蟬也者，蝭?也。【揚子·方言】蛥蚗，自關而東謂之虭蟧。或謂之蝭蟧。　又【集韻】都黎切，音低。丁計切，音帝。義?同。　又【類篇】常支切。與芪同。【爾雅註】蝭母，藥草，知母也。　又蝭蛙，鳥名。見蛙字註。　或作?、蛦。

蝭字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝭字的起名意思

暂无。

Jiao
Basic explanation of words
Jiao
dì
〔蝭蟧(
li 俹)] cicada.
Jiao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tí］
["Guangyun" Du Xiqie, level and set. ]
["Guangyun" all plan to cut, go to Ji, end. ]
(1) See "蝭蟧" and "蝭".
(2) See "Frog".
[②]［chí］
["Jiyun" regular branch cut, flat branch, Zen. ]
(1) See "蝭2跂".
(2) See "Jiao 2 mother".
Jiao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝭; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1090 Page 25
【Tang Yun】Du Xiqie 【Ji Yun】Tian Liqie, sound title.蟪蛄, 蟪蛄 also. [Big Dai Li] Those who are also cicadas, 蝭? 【Yangtze Dialect】The 蛥蚗 is called the 虭蟧 from Guan to the east. Or what is called 蝭蟧.　[Jiyun] Du Liqie, low pitch. Ding Jiqie, Yindi. Righteous? Same.　[Classes] often branch cut. Same as Qi. [Erya Note] Jiamu, medicinal herb, Zhimu also.　And the frog, the name of the bird. See frog note.　Or as?, 蛦.
Jiao
